Name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023
About the game: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023 puts you in control of your favorite pro football franchise. Enjoy the challenge of putting together a team that can be considered a dynasty. Draft, trade, sign free agents as you work to bring home the championship trophy. If assembling a team is not enough, go deeper with a vast array of options to create custom gameplans, strategies and even designing your own plays and playbooks! Watch the action unfold in dramatic 2D fashion where you can even take control and call your own plays! Brand new to the game this year is the Road to MVP option giving you the chance to take control over a player instead of a team. Will you be able to become one of the all-time greats? With that new mode in addition to challenge, sandbox and multiplayer modes hours of football awesomeness await you in Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023!
